slide.title: Conversion Between ISO-8859 Character Sets

list.bullet: Conversion will result in broken text

slide.example: ISO 8859-1 ISO-8859-2 Hex Char Hex Char Description E0 à -- - LATIN SMALL LETTER A WITH GRAVE E1 á E1 á LATIN SMALL LETTER A WITH ACUTE E2 â E2 â LATIN SMALL LETTER A WITH CIRCUMFLEX E3 ã -- - LATIN SMALL LETTER A WITH TILDE E4 ä E4 ä LATIN SMALL LETTER A WITH DIAERESIS E5 å -- - LATIN SMALL LETTER A WITH RING ABOVE E6 æ -- - LATIN SMALL LETTER AE E7 ç E7 ç LATIN SMALL LETTER C WITH CEDILLA E8 è -- - LATIN SMALL LETTER E WITH GRAVE E9 é E9 é LATIN SMALL LETTER E WITH ACUTE EA ê -- - LATIN SMALL LETTER E WITH CIRCUMFLEX EB ë EB ë LATIN SMALL LETTER E WITH DIAERESIS EC ì -- - LATIN SMALL LETTER I WITH GRAVE ED í ED í LATIN SMALL LETTER I WITH ACUTE EE î EE î LATIN SMALL LETTER I WITH CIRCUMFLEX EF ï -- - LATIN SMALL LETTER I WITH DIAERESIS
